title: Tuesday Post Show (04-13-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (04-13-21)
description:
Bobby talks about how the FDA and CDC are calling for an immediate pause in using the Johnson and Johnson single-dose vaccine because of concerns about clotting. We also check in with Raymundo who had a pretty big moment in his life and why he is taking a break from gambling. Bobby also talks about going to dinner last night in Malibu on the beach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
